Plot
This film is based on a true story about a British 
teenager who allegedly poisoned family, friends, 
and co-workers. Graham is highly intelligent, but 
completely amoral. He becomes interested in science, 
especially chemistry, and begins to read avidly. 
Something of a social misfit, he is fascinated by 
morbid subjects such as poisons and murder. His 
family environment is intolerable to him and, in 
particular, his stepmother torments him. He decides 
to poison those who annoy him, first with antimony 
and later with thallium. He smugly thinks himself 
cleverer than all those around him, but nevertheless 
he is caught and sentenced to 'rehabilitation' at a 
psychiatric institution. Once there, he undertakes to 
deceive the new eminent psychiatrist sent there to 
'cure' him, thereby securing his release.
